bio: Merchant-centric crypto payment gateway with world-class user experience.
impactDescription:
Our Open source dapp is an example to other payment processors.
Two wordpress merchants are downloading our plugin per day.
There are more than 250 merchant accounts created.
Merchant are starting to process payments. We expect around  $50,000 in volume per month in the coming month.
contributionDescription:
Crypto payments is the most underdeliver use case of blockchain. 
Sprintcheckout is making assets usable as a currency, so users can actually buy real stuff with their crypto winnings.
Sprintcheckout is one of the pay crypto payment processors available on optimism.
To make crypto payments usable, one of the enablers is ERC4337 (Account Abstraction).
Sprintcheckout is working with AA Wallets like Candide to specify the way gasless, recurrent payments and rewards can be done on Optimism.

fundingSources.description: no grants or funding received yet from Optimism

reportReason: Claims 10 OP tx per day but linked contract has 3 in total
